entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:24 PM EST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:24 PM EST Sunday 12 March 2023
